long_description: From summer concerts to weekend camping trips, the light and packable REI Trail chair gives you a comfortable place to sit down and relax. Lightweight and packable design allows you to take the chair on trips of all kinds-even backpacking! Fold-out section provides extra coverage for comfort on rock and snow, or folds under for extra seat cushioning. Ripstop polyester fabric and fiberglass stays provide comfortable support. Side connector straps adjust so you can fine-tune your sit angle. Rear mesh pocket stows a newspaper, magazine or book. Dual carry handles offer easy transport.
short_description: From summer concerts to weekend camping trips, the light and packable REI Trail chair gives you a comfortable place to sit down and relax.
